subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Organizers had one big worry: If they held the Tour of California in May, would big-name riders come? A look at the roster assured them that their gamble was worth it.
snippet: Organizers had one big worry: If they held the Tour of California in May, would big-name riders come? A look at the roster assured them that their gamble was worth it.
